Reviews.Title: “Great accomodation, but poor communication prior to our visit”
Reviews.Author: RichiSK
Reviews.Content: spacious located apartment building helpful staff 12 days stays checkin cleaning concierge services checkout run smoothly free parking options nice lake dubai marina view close emirates golf clubs 10min car visa prior visit uae tried contact hotel email phone day answer phone calls responsible missing person tooks 2 weeks send answer absolutely overpriced offer visa application compliance towels cleaning service changed day receive normal towels days

Reviews.Title: “Value over Service ....”
Reviews.Author: AAZH
Reviews.Content: simply apartment building managed hotel doing poor job units spacious views staff management professional lot training days towels placed booked unacceptable excuse accommodation service provider regardless reason staff informed simply smile inform promise towels couple hours needless start shouting ball rolls towels short prefer value service consider hotel note dubai lot options deals

Reviews.Title: “Luxury at budget prices !!!!”
Reviews.Author: NostalgicDream
Reviews.Content: wow booked advance 2 night stopover dubai girls birthday tell cant staff food service excellent location remember hire car time forked lot taxi round dont worry looking taxi outside reception dont fooled dubai marina metro station nearby figure able it’s walk taxi wont short fare question little walk complaint didnt check hour guy instead lower floors children third floor overall transport sorted hotel wont regret

Reviews.Title: “geat place for a business trip”
Reviews.Author: Nikko63
Reviews.Content: amazing apart hotel convenient business travelers space dine sleep living spacious 2 lavatories hotel dont valet parking main leisure dubai living own flat live rich expat housekeeping washing day washing machine unfortunatly wifi expensive catch free front lifts noisy morning prayer

Reviews.Title: “Really relaxing after whole day trips in Dubai”
Reviews.Author: Zelkalite
Reviews.Content: choose tripping dubai air conditioning perfect lighting system inside stayed 4 days everynight dubai tour relax inside heights balcony equipped kitchen time cleaning city voice relaxing sitting 4 people easy reach taxi 15 minutes burj khalifa taxi staff english helps time offer economic upperclass pleasure
